title: T210 Series 6 Lot of 4 for sale
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: T210 Series 6 Lot of 4 for sale
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone, I have decided to get rid of the majority of my T210 series 6 cards.  I have a lot of four I would like to sell.  They inlcude 4 winchester players.  All of these cards have been purchased from fellow board members over the last year.  Here are the 4 I have for sale:

1. Goostree With Bat: In a SGC A holder
2. Cornell Winchester: This is the nicest of the four
3. Kircher Winchester
4. Callahan Winchester

Scans are attached below.  I am asking $400.00 for the entire lot.  That is not a bad price considering these are very tough to find.  I will be happy to consider offers though and I may also sell the cards individually.  If interested email me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks

TT
I moved this lot to ebay.  A five day listing which starts today.  Good luck everyone.
